Content:
Mercia Popescu Bitcoin OG and Trilema owner, Rumored to have a million bitcoins

Is  of the opinion that btc 0.5.4 is the real Bitcoin. Segwit mearly runs alongside it. Addresses that begin with 1 are the real Bitcoin.
